name: steem-efficient-stream
description: Efficient way to stream blocks and account history from steem blockchain

scripts.check: if echo "$(node --version)" | grep -q "$(cat .nvmrc)"; then echo "Node version correct"; else echo "Node version does not match that in .nvmrc" && exit 1; fi
scripts.build: npm run check && npm run build:cleanbefore && npm run build:node && npm run build:lint
scripts.test: find src -name '*.spec.test.ts' | TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_CACHE=false TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' xargs mocha -r ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register
scripts.verify: find src -name '*.integration.test.ts' | TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_CACHE=false TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' xargs mocha -r ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register
scripts.all-tests: ( find src -name '*.spec.test.ts' & find src -name '*.integration.test.ts' ) | TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_CACHE=false TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' xargs mocha -r ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register

author: The Wise Team (https://wise-team.io/)
